title: Graphic Design
description: Alongside learning web development in high school, I also learned how to do graphic design, which I have found to make me an even better web designer/developer! Below are some of the best works I've made throughout the years.

projects.title: Sonic The Hedgehog Poster/Blanket
projects.description: Sonic has been one of my favorite game series of all time, and it is my friend's as well! This originally started as a poster, then after a suggestion from another friend became a blanket!

projects.title: Net Neutrality Poster
projects.description: In my "Communications for Engineers" class in college, we had to create an infographic for a tech topic. This was the poster we had printed for our presentation. I think we got an A!

projects.title: Residence Hall Rendering
projects.description: In my last year at USF working with the housing department, I created multiple 3D renderings of the "Dorms" ("Residence Halls") on campus. This was one of them. Fun fact: the rendering was done by importing models into the Half-Life 2 game engine!

projects.title: Housing Policies Poster
projects.description: This was a poster explaining some of the housing policies at USF. This was made during my time at the USF housing department.

projects.title: Campus Life Brochure
projects.description: This was the cover for a brochure USF handed out promoting living on campus.

projects.title: USF Housing Twitter Sign
projects.description: This was a poster advertising the USF Housing Twitter account for an event we hosted. My first graphic design project for USF's housing department!

projects.title: The Kangaroo Court
projects.description: The second in the series I like to call "dorm art", this was an abstract poster I made to hang in my dorm for one of my favorite songs at the time - "Kangaroo Court" by Capital Cities.

projects.title: Learning to Fly
projects.description: The first in the series I like to call "dorm art", this was an abstract poster I made to hang in my dorm for one of my favorite songs at the time - "Learning to Fly" by Pink Floyd.

projects.title: Commencement Booklet
projects.description: This was the cover of the commencement booklet that went our during our high school graduation. I was really proud of this one, and seeing it everywhere during our commencement was a cool experience!

projects.title: Manta Stand Ad
projects.description: This was an ad for our school's "swag" store that went in the yearbook. I'm in the middle of the group photo!

projects.title: Desktop Wallpaper
projects.description: During my web design class in high school, I submitted this entry in a competition to replace the default wallpaper on all computers in our school. It won! This wallpaper stayed around until the school finally moved away from 4:3 monitors a few years later.
